Reviews.Title: “Star On Taksim Square”
Reviews.Author: AZIZ N
Reviews.Content: spent 5 beautiful days istanbul sep 2011 gd stay stayed view facing 6th taksim star gd neat breakfast average staff vey helpful excellent location steps famous taksim square istikal street upgrade key system ac rest grt

Reviews.Title: “Small but OK for a cheap price!”
Reviews.Author: Lovinthesun26
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel march 5 nights hotel lot expected suitable short stay booked 2 double checked twin double double extremely clean queen size bed double bathroom clean suitable single person 2 people staying struggle twin average size bathroom clean cleaned daily fresh towels breakfast â€“ basic turkish breakfast limited choice quality edible location â€“ 5 minute walk taksim square quickest hotel dark alley managed cheap deal hotel rate hotel tripled willing pay stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Hotel, Small Rooms”
Reviews.Author: arjungupta101
Reviews.Content: location 5mins walk taksim square istiklal street happening clean amenities smartly fitted everthing comfortable complaints service staff helpful eager sell sightseeing tours breakfast okish breakfast isnt meal turkey ok mainly bread jam cheese fruit noisy night close fast traffic moving road

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: tom_ashford_uk
Reviews.Content: value hotel fancy hotel clean comfortable staff helpful friendly location close taksim square istiklal caddesi nightlife easy transport metrotram reaching virtually istanbul breakfast buffet plentiful choice foods little eclectic

Reviews.Title: “Tiny room @ vey good location”
Reviews.Author: jajabor_95
Reviews.Content: location clean expecting budget hotel tiny expected 50euros 3 suitcases difficult time accomodating tiny breakfast vey basic looking adapter laptop plug 3 pin european 2 pin inlet told itll cost 20 turkish lira bought adapter day 150 turkish lira

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable clean hotel suitable for those on a budget”
Reviews.Author: BrieEngland
Reviews.Content: friends lovely stay base shop close taksim square easily accessible taxi public transport major attractions staff friendly helpful organising trips look forward returning future

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel in a very good location”
Reviews.Author: Wdave37
Reviews.Content: youre looking stay taksim spend little money avoid hostel stay pretty youre okay 7 minute walk hustle bustle istikal street busiest drag istanbul bellhop provides service free wireless internet real negative breakfast pretty boring hotel hard time
